sentences.sContent: Many scientists agree that the domestic dog displays more morphological variation than any other known species, thanks to selective breeding by humans.
sentences.sContent_eng: Many scientists agree that the domestic dog displays more morphological variation than any other known species, thanks to selective breeding by humans.
sentences.sCn: 许多科学家都认为，国内的狗更显示形态比任何其他已知的物种变异，人类有选择育种的感谢。

sentences.sContent: Other morphological features have also been identified that are inconsistent with a bird-from-dinosaur theory.
sentences.sContent_eng: Other morphological features have also been identified that are inconsistent with a bird-from-dinosaur theory.
sentences.sCn: 其他的形态学特征也被认为与鸟类自恐龙演化的理论不一致。

words.tran: 形态学，形态论；[语] 词法，[语] 词态学
在屏幕上变换图像；改变
